summary: "Home Alone" is a 1990 comedy film about a boy named Kevin, played by Macaulay Culkin, who is accidentally left behind when his family goes on vacation. He must defend his Chicago home from two robbers. The movie was directed by Chris Columbus and written by John Hughes. It became really popular, making a lot of money and turning Culkin into a famous child star. It's now considered one of the best Christmas movies and was even chosen to be saved in the National Film Registry. A sequel came out in 1992.
title: Home Alone
